articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Opening Address at Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Opening Address at Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of WPK Cells
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made an opening address at the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					In his opening address he said the meeting of secretaries of cells, the fourth in the glorious history of the WPK, is a significant meeting which was convened at the behest of leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il considered the development of the party cells as a main link and master key to strengthening the whole party, successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's cause of building a revolutionary party, he pointed out that Kim Jong Il lucidly penetrated into the requirements of the period of historic turn in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche with his brilliant wisdom and rare far-sightedness and gave important teachings on organizing a meeting of secretaries of party cells with an attendance of 10 000 persons in the future so that the secretaries of the cells might contribute large shares to strengthening the party cells.
					
					The current meeting will be an epochal turning point in increasing the party's capability in every way as required by the new era of the Juche revolution by decisively enhancing the function and role of the party cells, he noted, and continued:
					
					We are facing tasks to further glorify the eternal revolutionary feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetime, holding high the immortal banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and give steady continuity to building a thriving country and achieving the cause of national reunification.
					
					In order to successfully carry out the important tasks of the party, it is necessary to change the appearance of the party as a political staff leading the revolution and construction and a mother party sharing life and death with the working popular masses.
					
					The party cells, the grass-roots organizations of the party in strengthening it organizationally and ideologically, consolidating the ties of blood between the party and the people and powerfully mobilizing all service personnel and people to the building of a thriving country and scouts in implementing the party's policies, have very important duties to perform.
					
					If hundreds of thousands of party cells active in all regions, fields and posts of the country are fully prepared, it will be possible to put fresh spurs to the party work and overall affairs of the state and encourage all service personnel and people to perform world-startling miracles.
					
					When all party cell secretaries unite close around the Central Committee of the WPK and hundreds of thousands of party cells become unshakable cornerstones supporting it and fortresses, the prestige and capability of the party as a leader will remarkably increase and the red flag of the WPK will flutter on the eminence of a thriving nation.
					
					The Central Committee of the WPK is determined to make this meeting a decisive occasion of bringing about a great turn in the overall party work by reviewing the successes, experience and defects in the past period and radically improving and strengthening the work of the party cells. 
					
					Expressing the belief that the meeting will satisfactorily carry out its work thanks to great enthusiasm and active participation of the comrades present and thus provide a historic landmark in strengthening and developing the party and building a thriving socialist nation, he declared the meeting open.

articles.title: Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of WPK Opens
articles.content:
Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of WPK Opens
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was opened here Monday with splendor.
					The meeting will discuss the issues of enhancing the function and role of the party cells, the grass-roots organizations of the party and scouts in implementing the party's policies, to strengthen the whole party, increase the national power of the great Paektusan nation in every way and powerfully mobilize all service personnel and people to building a thriving country as required by the new era of the Juche revolution and the prevailing situation.
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, and leading cadres of the party, the state and the army, secretaries of party cells and party cadres here and local areas.
					
					All the participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, founder and leaders of the WPK and eternal leaders of the party and revolution.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un made an opening address.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, made a report.
					
					Then the floor was taken by Sin Chol Min, secretary of the party cell of the Hero Group for Defusing Explosives of the Kangwon Provincial People's Security Bureau, Kwon Ryong Un, secretary of the Primary Party Committee of the research center under the Korean Committee of Space Technology, Hyon Kun Sik, secretary of the party cell of the transport workshop of the Chonggang Mechanization Office of the Tideland Reclamation Complex in North Phyongan Province, Kim Chol Hae, secretary of the party cell of the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, Kim Ok Bun, secretary of the party cell of Han Hyon Gyong Secondary School in Sinhung County, Kim Hun, secretary of the party cell of the College of Computer Science of Kim Il Sung University, and others.
					
					They renewed their resolution to bring about a radical turn in the work for turning the party cells into unshakable cornerstones propping the WPK and death-defying corps for implementing the party's line as required by the developing situation.
					
					The meeting continues.

articles.title: Best Athletes of 2012 Selected in DPRK
articles.content:
Best Athletes of 2012 Selected in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Best athletes of Juche 101 (2012) in different sporting events were selected in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Among them are footballers Pak Nam Chol (male) and Kim Un Hwa (female), weightlifters Kim Un Guk (male) and Rim Jong Sim (female), judoist An Kum Ae (female), wrestlers Yang Kyong Il (male) and Han Kum Ok (female) and gymnasts Ri Se Gwang (male) and Hong Un Jong (female).
					
					Pak Nam Chol was awarded the prize of best player at the 2012 AFC Challenger Cup Tournament and Kim Un Hwa the Adidas Gold Boot at the 2012 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					
					Kim Un Guk, Rim Jong Sim and An Kum Ae won gold medals at the 30th Olympic Games.
					
					Yang Kyong Il, Han Kum Ok, Ri Se Gwang and Hong Un Jong proved successful at various international tournaments.
					
					Besides, 20 odd persons were selected as best athletes.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Players Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Players Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Taekwon-Do has become one of the most popular sporting events among young people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					In this regard, KCNA met Yun Kwang Sik, a vice department director of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					He said:
					
					"There are more than 200 Taekwon-Do groups nationwide, involving thousands of players. The group, run by the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace, has more than 100 players.
					
					Some of the players have displayed their high techniques at various national tournaments, including the annual National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize, drawing attention of Taekwon-Do experts and fans. 
					
					Most of the local Taekwon-do aces had belonged to juvenile Taekwon-Do groups."

articles.title: Sports Activities Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Activities Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- All over the DPRK, the people are active in sports activities.
					It can be strikingly illustrated by the on-going 18th Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions for Paektusan Prize, which was opened on Jan. 24.
					
					These days, there are taking place such events as basketball and volleyball.
					
					The Pyongyang Automation Instrument Factory, Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, Pyongyang Passenger and Freight Car Corps and other industrial establishments here are making sports an inseparable part of the daily life. Such sports activities make the people full of confidence and optimism.
					
					Institutions, factories, enterprises and farms across the country worked out the plans for operating the sports day every month in an effective manner, conducting mass rhythmic exercise, Taekwon-Do exercise for health and jogging in a regular way.
					
					Among the sports events are basketball, volleyball, Korean chess and a yut-game.

articles.title: Preparations for 17th Kimjongilia Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for 17th Kimjongilia Festival in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 17th Kimjongilia Festival are gaining momentum in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					In this regard, KCNA met Ri Pyong Pha, a department director of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					He said:
					
					This year's festival, to be held under the theme of "Kimjongilia coming into full bloom with strong yearning for leader Kim Jong Il", will be attended by military institutions, commissions, ministries and national institutions and individuals.
					
					It will be also participated in by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), other overseas Koreans' bodies and overseas compatriots, diplomatic missions in the DPRK, foreign organizations and individuals.
					
					Exhibition pavilions are to be set up at the festival venue in representation of the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed for the country and the people and for independence of mankind as well as the mettle of the DPRK that is speeding up the building of an economic giant after a successful satellite launch.
					
					The participants are decorating their pavilions in a peculiar way in line with the overall design of the exhibition hall.
					
					This winter is very cold with low sunshine rate. But, the flowers are coming into full bloom at Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses across the country thanks to sincerity of the festival participants.
					
					Meanwhile, the festival posters have already come out.

articles.title: Many Greenhouses Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Production Goes Up in Light Industrial Sector of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Light industrial factories in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been in full operation from the outset of the year.
					 In January the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory and the Pyongyang Flour-Processing Factory have raised production twice as compared with the previous year, the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory and the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda Pop Mill 1.6 times and the Pyongyang Foodstuff Packing Materials Factory 1.5 times.
					
					 The Susongchon General Foodstuff Factory has fulfilled its daily production quota at 150 percent. The factory also made a big progress in upgrading the quality of soft drinks through a mass technological innovation movement.
					
					The Sinuiju Knitted Goods Factory has kept its production on a normal basis. It applied an advanced dying method and invented a new kind of seaming machine, thus topping the daily target by 20 percent.
					
					 Besides, production is soaring up at the Songyo Knitted Goods Factory and other knitting and textile mills across the country.

articles.title: DPRK People Hail Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's Decision
articles.content:
DPRK People Hail Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's Decision
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, expressed his firm resolve to take substantial and high-profile important state measures in view of the prevailing situation at a recent consultative meeting of officials in the fields of state security and foreign affairs.
					Upon hearing the news, all the people of the country, including the servicepersons, have hailed his decision, hardening their will to turn out as one in the all-out action against the United States.
					
					Kim Kum Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					"The news has lashed us, servicepersons, into a great excitement.
					
					We are sure of victory in the showdown with the U.S. as we are led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					The KPA, the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army, fully supports Marshal Kim Jong Un's resolve."
					
					Kwon Yong Chol, another KPA officer, said:
					
					"The KPA, under the command of Marshal Kim Jong Un, has nothing to be afraid of.
					
					We are fully ready for a war against the U.S. Once Kim Jong Un gives an order, the KPA will root out the den of evils, the United States."
					
					Rim Chol Guk, a researcher of Hamhung University of Agriculture, said:
					
					"Since respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made a decision, the DPRK will surely win victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					I am confident of the victory as the DPRK is fully prepared to cope with anything.
					
					So long as there remain the imperialists on the earth, it will be impossible to ensure the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and the world peace.
					
					Now that the U.N. 'resolution' on tightening sanctions against the DPRK began taking effective, the DPRK has no other choice but to fight against the imperialists."
					
					Pak Ryong Su, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					"I can never understand why the U.S. labeled the DPRK's satellite launch as a provocation. From long ago, a lot of nations in the world have launched satellites.
					
					I can hardly repress my surging indignation at the shameless acts of the U.S. and its followers taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch only.
					
					Once Marshal Kim Jong Un gives an order, I, a discharged soldier, will rejoin the army to annihilate them who trampled upon our dignity and sovereignty.

articles.title: Young People Make Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Young People Make Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Young people in Ryanggang Province made a study tour of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp from January 22 to 28 on the occasion of his birth anniversary and the first anniversary of the autographed letter sent by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					During the march its members laid floral baskets and bouquets before statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower, Revolutionary Battle Site in Pochonbo, the shore of Lake Samji and the Chongbong Bivouac and the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at the secret camp before paying tribute to them.
					
					They held a meeting for starting the march in front of the tower.
					
					They marched along the course of the study tour explored by Kim Jong Il towards the revolutionary battle site in the area of Mt. Paektu more than half a century back. After being briefed on the Revolutionary Battle Site in Pochonbo, they went round the command post, police sub-station and the sub-county office of the Japanese imperialists, etc. at that time. 
					
					They arrived at the secret camp in Mt. Paektu via the Spring Site in Poso-ri, Junghung tableland, Revolutionary Site in Pothae and Chongbong Bivouac. They held a meeting to adopt a letter to Kim Jong Un in front of the birthplace of Kim Jong Il.
					
					After being briefed on the Samjiyon Grand Monument at Lake Samji, they toured the groups of subsidiary sculptures and visited the township of Samjiyon, which has undergone a dramatic change.
					
					Diverse political and cultural events took place during their study tour.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Published Many Works on Original Songun Revolutionary Theory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Published Many Works on Original Songun Revolutionary Theory
Pyongyang, Janaury 28 (KCNA) -- Ten years have passed since leader Kim Jong Il published the work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), comprehensively systematizes and reflects the idea and theory of the Songun revolutionary leadership, the Songun politics based on the analysis of achievements and precious experience made in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					In the middle of the 1990s when the Korean revolution faced a rigorous hardship Kim Jong Il enforced the Songun politics in all fields and published many works, clearly indicating the way of victory in accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					The work "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party" indicates the line of giving priority to developing defence industry and simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture as required by the Songun era.
					
					Some works reflect the steadfast will of the party to build a thriving socialist nation full of confidence of certain victory under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, the traits and work style to be displayed by the leading officials of the revolution, the party's idea of giving importance to the youth, the mission and duty of working people's organizations and the issue of bringing into full bloom the Songun culture created by the People's Army in whole society.
					
					"The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" clarifies the popular and independent character of the DPRK, which embodies the Juche idea in the building and activities of the state, and the idea and theories of firmly adhering to the Juche-oriented principle, the principle of national independence in the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: U.S. Mistook Koreans: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Mistook Koreans: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A consultative meeting of officials in the fields of state security and foreign affairs in view of the grave situation prevailing in the DPRK took place under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					At the meeting Kim Jong Un expressed the firm resolution to take substantial and high-profile important state measures in view of the prevailing situation and advanced specific tasks to the officials concerned.
					
					His firm resolution is just one to defend the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country in view of the new situation and circumstances created on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity after the successful launch of the DPRK's satellite. 
					
					It is important for us to put a satellite into orbit, but it is more important to defend the legitimate right to the use of space for peaceful purposes. 
					
					If the DPRK steps back from this, it will allow its right to existence to be infringed upon, to say nothing of development toward a thriving nation. To defend the right to use space for peaceful purposes is not just the issue of the right to develop space but the issue of defending the sovereignty and achieving the prosperity of the country and the nation. 
					
					The hostile forces including the U.S. imperialists regard the DPRK advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism as a thorn in their flesh. The U.S. considers the DPRK emerging a thriving nation in the strategic center of the 21st century as a blatant challenge to its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. That is why the U.S. uses the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 as the best pretext for bringing down the social system in the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. groundlessly denied the DPRK's right to satellite launch, taking issue with it, and fabricated "a resolution on sanctions" at the UN Security Council this time. This is an unpardonable hostile action as it disclosed the U.S. inveterate repugnancy and enmity towards the ideology and social system chosen by the people in the DPRK. 
					
					The DPRK has already warned the U.S. and those countries concerned on historic December 12 when it succeeded in the satellite launch. 
					
					Hostility does no good to anyone and with confrontation it is impossible to settle any problem. We hoped to see all countries concerned take a reasonable and calm attitude so that the situation might not develop in the direction contrary to their will and desire. 
					
					However, the U.S. disregarded it and took an extremely arrogant attitude of hurting the dignity of the Korean nation. Finally, it cooked up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and vociferated about "crucial measures," deliberately straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity. 
					
					Now that the U.S. hostile strategy to stifle the DPRK by force of arms has reached its height and it has become clear that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and the world is nothing but an empty talk, the DPRK is left with no option but to take strong physical counter-measures to defend its sovereignty. 
					
					The DPRK's cause of defending independence and justice is right and its victory is sure to come. 
					
					The U.S. will come to know what dear price it will have to pay for insulting and mocking the Koreans. 
					
					Satellites and long-range rockets to be launched by the DPRK without let-up and the nuclear test of higher level to be conducted by it in the all-out action, a new stage of the anti-U.S. struggle, will be targeted against the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people. 
					
					The world will clearly know what tremendous might the servicepersons and people of the DPRK will display and what great history of a thriving nation they will make, aware of the justice of their cause and single-mindedly united behind their leader.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Mandarin's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Mandarin's Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Vice-Minister of Unification of south Korea Kim Chon Sik talked about "unification" on Jan. 23 far from making an apology for bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. This is a mockery and insult to all Koreans aspiring after independent and peaceful reunification, says Minju Joson Monday in a bylined commentary:
					It goes on:
					
					It is needless to say that by "opportunity of unification" he meant the one of "contingency" and "unification under liberal democracy," a daydream of the group of traitors.
					
					It is ridiculous that Kim let loose such piffle, keeping in mind the fact that the U.S. fabricated provocative "resolution on sanctions," terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes an inter-continental ballistic missile launch in collusion with its allies. He is so naive as to calculate that if the UNSC's "resolution" is put into force, a sort of "contingency" will take place in the DPRK just as what happened in other countries.
					
					Frankly speaking, "contingency" is taking place in south Korea.
					
					What Kim uttered is nothing but sheer sophism let loose by an anti-reunification confrontation maniac keen to realize the group's ambition through confrontation between the two differing social systems.
					
					This is, however, no more than a daydream.

articles.title: Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of WPK Will Mark Epochal Turn in Party Building: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of WPK Will Mark Epochal Turn in Party Building: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), a historic grand gathering, will clearly demonstrate once again the organizational and ideological solidity and might of the party as well as the faith and will of all the party members and other people to absolutely believe in and follow the great mother party, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial. 
					The WPK is the glorious party that demonstrates its dignity as invincible guiding forces as it has been led by the great leaders, says the editorial. It goes on:
					
					President Kim Il Sung carved out an original way for party founding by calling for organizing grassroots level organizations first and then expanding and strengthening them. He, at the same time, made great efforts to consolidate the party cells in the whole course of leading the revolution.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il successfully embodied the Juche-oriented idea and feats of party building of the President and developed the party into a powerful vanguard of the revolution that boasts of a great number of party cells with strong sense of organization and discipline.
					
					The Korean revolution has now entered a high stage of comprehensively building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Today the party faces the important tasks to beef up the political and military might of the country, open a turning phase of building an economic giant and usher in a new era of cultural efflorescence in the 21st century.
					
					The main purpose of the meeting is to continue to give spiritual boost to the party members and other people, foil the imperialist reactionaries' desperate suffocation moves and accelerate the final victory on all fronts for building a thriving nation.
					
					It is the party's intention to make sure that steady continuity is given to the WPK's history of "Believing in the people as in Heaven" by making Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's outlook on the people run through the whole party.
					
					The editorial calls upon all the participants in the meeting, secretaries of the party cells across the country, party members and other people to bring about fundamental innovations in their work and lead the march of another century of Juche in the van, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Protect Its Sovereignty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Protect Its Sovereignty
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The all-out action declared by the DPRK is a just patriotic struggle to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined article. 
					Forcing the DPRK to give up the right to satellite launch is little short of pressurizing it to abandon its sovereignty, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are seriously mistaken if they think they can frighten the army and people of the DPRK with "sanctions" and pressure. It is the steadfast will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK that it is better to live even a day, their chests thrown out, in defence of their independent dignity rather than living many years of servile life under other's pressure. The DPRK will as ever dynamically push forward the building of a thriving socialist nation, mercilessly meeting the blatant challenges of the enemies, thanks to the strong foundation of the self-supporting national economy, single-minded unity and might of the Songun politics. 
					
					Invariable is the stand of the DPRK to react to provocations with prompt counter blows and to a war of aggression with a just war for national reunification. The DPRK regards the "sanctions" as a war and declaration of war against it. If the south Korean group of traitors finally embarks upon implementing the "resolution on sanctions" in collusion with aggressor outside forces, defying the DPRK's warnings, it will never miss the golden chance. 
					
					Whoever hurts the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit will never be safe wherever he is. It is the mettle of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu to find out those who hurt the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and mercilessly punish them.

articles.title: DPRK's Right to Space Development for Peaceful Purposes Inviolable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Right to Space Development for Peaceful Purposes Inviolable: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- No force on earth can block the Korean people all out to defend the independent rights including the right to space development, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article. It goes on:
					The U.S. and its allies are persistently taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch. This is aimed to bring it to its knees and stifle it under the pretext of this launch for the mere reason that it is not yielding to their highhanded and arbitrary practices.
					
					The frantic row kicked up by the U.S. over "the missile threat" under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch is intended to justify its military moves to establish hegemony by citing it.
					
					The U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific policy is aimed to cook up NATO of Asian version involving south Korea, Japan, Australia and other countries. It also seeks to build a regional missile shield. It is exploiting the DPRK's satellite launch for creating an environment to attain such purpose.
					
					The situation is inching close to an unpredictable phase due to the vicious moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK. This clearly indicates that in order to defend justice and the sovereignty of the country, it is necessary to build up one's own strength.
					
					It is self-evident that the DPRK cannot abandon its independent right to use space recognized by international laws.
					
					The U.S. and its allies should not abuse the DPRK's space development for peaceful purposes for attaining their sinister aims.
					
					They would be well advised to ponder over the consequences to be entailed, before conducting careless and irresponsible acts in pursuance of their immediate interests.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Brazil, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Brazil, Ethiopia
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Seminars, round-table talks and reading sessions on the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un took place at the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, an Ethiopian company and branches of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea in the period between January 9 and 19.
					The secretary general of the Brazilian Center and other speakers said that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people advancing along the way of independence, Songun and socialism upholding the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					The chief designer of the Ethiopian company said: The Korean people are advancing straight along the road chosen by themselves, united close around Kim Jong Un. I keenly realized this through the DPRK's successful satellite launch in December last year.
					
					The New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un serves as the DPRK's blueprint for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					There is nothing impossible if one has a correct blueprint.
					
					I wish the Korean people great success in building a thriving nation and carrying out the cause of national reunification in accordance with the blueprint put forward by Kim Jong Un this year.

articles.title: Proposal for Korea's Reunification Supported by Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Proposal for Korea's Reunification Supported by Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, released a statement on January 19 supporting the proposal for Korea's reunification set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					He said:
					
					The Korean nation with a long history of five thousand years has undergone sufferings resulting from the territorial division into the north and the south caused by the U.S. imperialists even in the 21st century.
					
					The day is sure to come when the fraternal Korean people put an end to the artificial division of the country, the height of shamelessness of imperialism.
					
					We highly praise the Korean people for working astonishing miracles before the world.
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his New Year Address that all Koreans should unite and open a new phase in the country's reunification through a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification.
					
					I pay tribute to him for exerting efforts for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country true to the intentions of the preceding leaders.
					
					Korea will become a reunified country and demonstrate its might before the world as Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the revolution.

articles.title: Preparatory Committees for Marking Day of Shining Star Formed in India, Romania
articles.content:
Preparatory Committees for Marking Day of Shining Star Formed in India, Romania
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for marking the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) were formed in India and Romania on Jan. 21 and 22.
					Sitaram Yechury, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), and Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees respectively.
					
					The committees decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to widely introduce immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il for the human cause of independence on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: AAPSO Supports DPRK FM Memorandum
articles.content:
AAPSO Supports DPRK FM Memorandum
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO) released a statement on Jan. 22 supporting the memorandum issued by the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					The statement said:
					
					2013 marks the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement that was signed at the close of the war in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. seeks to turn the now-defunct "UN Command," ghost of the Cold War, into a parent body of the Asian version of NATO disguised as a "multinational forces command" pursuant to a new defense strategy in a bid to maintain the status of armistice.
					
					The AAPSO agrees to the assertion clarified in the memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry that it is necessary to awaken the international community to a grave danger to be caused by the U.S. which brings dark clouds of war to hang over the Asian-Pacific region, the world's biggest hotspot.
					
					The organization demands the U.S. dissolve the "UN Command" and repeal the anti-DPRK hostile policy by signing the DPRK-U.S. peace agreement and thus provide a favorable atmosphere for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The body, availing the opportunity, extends support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for removing the confrontation between the north and the south, implementing the north-south joint declarations and independently settling the issue of the country's reunification by the efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the General Association of Koreans in China released a statement on January 23 under the title of "We condemn the unpardonable criminal acts which wantonly infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK."
					The statement called the U.S.-masterminded "resolution" an outrageous hostile act aimed to ban the DPRK from launching satellites for peaceful purposes and tighten the "sanctions" to deter it from making economic development and increasing the defense capabilities.
					
					It said that not a few countries in the world have launched satellites but the UNSC has never taken up for discussion or called into question the satellite launches by them. It is asserting the gangster-like logic that only the DPRK's satellite launch was "illegal," the statement noted.
					
					The UNSC adopted the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in breach of international law and in line with the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, revealing its sordid aims to force the DPRK to disarm itself and overthrow the social system in it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The UNSC's stand is that the country to which it is hostile should neither possess the self-defensive means nor launch a satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					It is, however, mistaken if it thinks that its shameless high-handed and arbitrary practices will work on the DPRK.
					
					The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China fully support the statement of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK which declared that it would not sit for any dialogue for discussing the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula but take whatever physical countermeasures for increasing the military capabilities for self-defence including the nuclear deterrence quantitatively and qualitatively to cope with the prevailing situation.

articles.title: Korean Organization in China Slams UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
Korean Organization in China Slams UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions"
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Jan. 23 denouncing the U.S. and its allies for fabricating the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions".
					The statement said:
					
					The recently fabricated "resolution" was an illegal, brigandish and provocative document as it is peppered with heinous hostile measures taken by the U.S. imperialist forces and their allies to tighten "sanctions" against the DPRK under the pretext of its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					It is preposterous for them to insist that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes was problematic because it used "ballistic missile technology". This brigandish sophism reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					The prevailing situation goes to clearly prove once again that it is necessary to counter the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK with strength and that the road of independence and Songun chosen by it is entirely just.
					
					The UNSC should make an honest apology for seriously infringing upon the sovereignty of an independent state, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, in violation of the universally accepted international law, and retract at once all the unreasonably  fabricated "resolutions".
					
					Songun Korea will continue legitimately exercising the independent and legal right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes in accordance with international law on the use of space for peaceful purposes.
					
					It will take physical retaliatory measures any moment to bolster up both in quality and quantity military capability for self-defense including nuclear deterrent to cope with the evermore undisguised U.S. "sanctions" against it.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Concealing Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Concealing Crimes against Humanity
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News on Jan. 25 blasted the Japanese conservative forces for concealing Japan's past crimes against humanity.
					It recalled that the Tokyo Metropolitan Education Committee of Japan on Jan. 24 decided to delete from a textbook published by itself an expression that Japan killed Koreans during the great Kanto quake. It pointed out that an official of the committee made no scruple of letting out outbursts intended to cover up Japan's mass killings of Koreans, asserting that "it is hard to judge they were all murdered" and it took into consideration the fact that the word massacre sounds cruel." 
					
					It said that in those days the Japanese government floated in an organized manner a groundless rumor that Koreans sought to rise in a revolt, in a bid to bring the social chaos under control and this resulted in killing Koreans in Japan in cold blood.
					
					It stressed that in 2008 the Japanese government in a report on the great Kanto quake recognized the fact that those Koreans who were killed due to that groundless rumor held the biggest proportion and there were many instances of deaths to which an expression of massacre was appropriate.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un declara inaugurada IV conferencia de secretarios de celula del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un declara inaugurada IV conferencia de secretarios de celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El respetado camarada Kim Jong Un pronuncio la palabra inaugural de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					En su discurso, el dijo que la presente conferencia, que se convoca por cuarta vez en la gloriosa historia del PTC, es el conclave significativo preparado segun el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, eterno Secretario General del PTC. 
					
					Al continuar con brillantez la causa de construccion del partido revolucionario del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente considero el desarrollo de las celulas del partido como cuestion clave para el fortalecimiento de todo el partido, asevero.
					
					Con su genial perspicacia y extraordinaria prevision, el Dirigente se percato de lo que demandaba el periodo de viraje historico en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y dio la indicacion programatica de convocar en lo adelante la conferencia de los secretarios de celula con una dimension de 10 mil para que estos puedan jugar un papel importante en el fortalecimiento de sus celulas, recordo.  
					
					Destaco que el presente conclave sera un punto de viraje trascendental para elevar decisivamente la funcion y el papel de las celulas del partido y aumentar por todos los medios el poderio combativo del partido de acuerdo con la demanda de la revolucion jucheana que entro en su nueva etapa. 
					
					A continuacion, menciono las tareas para glorificar las hazanas revolucionarias sin precedentes de los grandes Generalisimos y darles continuidad mediante la construccion del Estado prospero socialista y el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera del imperecedero kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Para cumplir excelentemente las importantes tareas que se presentan al partido, es preciso renovar la imagen de esta organizacion como Estado Mayor Politico que conduce la revolucion y la construccion y partido madre que comparte la vida y la muerte con las masas populares trabajadoras, subrayo. 
					
					Es muy importante el deber que asumen las celulas, unidades basicas del partido y avanzadas en el cumplimiento de las politicas del partido, en fortalecer en lo ideologico y organizativo la misma agrupacion, consolidar los lazos sanguineos entre esta y el pueblo y movilizar a todos los militares y civiles en la construccion del Estado prospero, acoto.
					
					Si estan bien preparadas cientos de miles de celulas del partido que operan en todas las zonas, sectores y puestos del pais, es posible dar nuevo impulso a la labor partidista y los quehaceres estatales en general y movilizar de una vez a todos los militares y habitantes en la creacion de milagros que sorprendan al mundo, afirmo.
					
					Cuando los secretarios de celula de todo el partido se unan firmemente en torno al Comite Central del Partido y cientos de miles de celulas se hagan piedras angulares y baluartes del partido, creceran considerablemente la autoridad directiva y la combatividad de nuestro partido y su bandera roja flameara orgullosamente en la cima del Estado prospero, dijo.
					
					El Comite Central del Partido decidio hacer de este conclave una ocasion decisiva para registrar un viraje en las labores partidistas en su conjunto, al balancear los exitos, experiencias y errores reportados en el pasado y mejorar radicalmente las labores de las celulas, apunto.
					
					Declaro inaugurada la conferencia, convencido de que ella marcara un hito historico para el desarrollo del PTC y la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista al concluir plenamente su agenda de trabajo gracias al gran entusiasmo y la participacion activa de todos los asistentes.

articles.title: Inaugurada en Pyongyang la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del PTC
articles.content:
Inaugurada en Pyongyang la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada con solemnidad el dia 28 en esta capital la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El conclave discutira los problemas que se presentan para fortalecer todo el partido al elevar la funcion y el papel de sus celulas, unidades basicas del partido y avanzadas en el cumplimiento de las politicas del partido, consolidar mil veces el poderio estatal de la potencia del monte Paektu y llamar a todos los militares y habitantes a la construccion del Estado prospero conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche y la situacion creada.
					
					Asistio a la ocasion el respetado camarada Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los secretarios de celula del partido y los funcionarios del partido en el centro y localidades.
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fundador y dirigente del PTC y lideres eternos del partido y la revolucion.
					
					El respetado camarada Kim Jong Un pronuncio la palabra inaugural.
					
					El miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, presento el informe de la ocasion. 
					
					Intervinieron Sin Chol Min, secretario de la celula del partido en el Cuerpo Heroe de Desactivacion de Explosivos del Departamento de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Provincia de Kangwon, Kwon Ryong Un, secretario del comite de la organizacion primaria del partido en un instituto adscrito al Comite de Tecnologias Espaciales de Corea, Hyon Kun Sik, secretario de la celula del partido en el taller de transporte de la Empresa de Mecanizacion de Chonggang del Complejo de Roturacion de Marismas de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Chol Hae, secretario de la celula del partido en la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon, Kim Ok Bun, secretaria de la celula del partido en la Escuela Secundaria Han Hyon Gyong del distrito de Sinhung, Kim Hun, secretario de la celula del partido en el Instituto Superior de Cibernetica de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, y otros. 
					
					En la presente conferencia significativa, que se realiza en presencia del respetado camarada Kim Jong Un, los oradores expresaron la decision de registrar un cambio trascendental en las labores para consolidar las celulas como piedras angulares del PTC y unidades que cumplen a toda costa las politicas de la organizacion, conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo. 
					
					El conclave continua.

articles.title: Seleccionados mejores deportistas por disciplinas de 2012
articles.content:
Seleccionados mejores deportistas por disciplinas de 2012
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron seleccionados mejores jugadores por disciplinas del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche. 
					Ellos son Pak Nam Chol (m) y Kim Un Hwa (f) en futbol; Kim Un Guk (m) y Rim Jong Sim (f) en el levantamiento de pesas; An Kum Ae (f) en el judo; Yang Kyong Il (m) y Han Kum Ok (f) en la lucha; Ri Se Gwang (m) y Hong Un Jong (f) en la gimnasia.
					
					Pak Nam Chol recibio el premio de mejor jugador en la Copa de Retadores de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol de 2012 mientras que Kim Un Hwa gano el zapato de oro en la Copa Mundial (F) sub-20 de la FIFA 2012.
					
					Kim Un Guk, Rim Jong Sim y An Kum Ae honraron a la Corea del Songun con medallas de oro conquistadas en los XXX Juegos Olimpicos. 
					
					Yang Kyong Il y Han Kum Ok obtuvieron tambien buenas notas en varias competencias internacionales.
					
					Ri Se Gwang y Hong Un Jong sobresalieron en el ejercicio de aros (m) y en el potro femenino del V Campeonato Asiatico de Gimnasia.
					
					Mas de una veintena de jugadores fueron catalogados como mejores deportistas.

articles.title: EE.UU. pagara el alto precio, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. pagara el alto precio, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se convoco una reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de sectores de la seguridad estatal y las relaciones exteriores sobre la grave situacion creada en estos dias en nuestro pais.
					En la ocasion, el Mariscal expreso la decision resuelta de tomar las realistas e intensivas medidas importantes estatales frente a la situacion creada y dio a los funcionarios de los sectores correspondientes las tareas concretas.
					
					Su decision es la mas justa tomada para defender la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del pais tomando en consideracion la situacion y las circunstancias creadas nuevamente en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno despues del lanzamiento exitoso del satelite.
					
					Para nosotros es importante poner en la orbita espacial el satelite artificial, pero es mas importante defender el legitimo derecho al uso del cosmos con fines pacificos.
					
					Si nos retrocedemos de aqui, no podemos lograr el desarrollo hacia el Estado prospero ni defender el derecho a la subsistencia. Defender el derecho al uso pacifico del cosmos no es una simple cuestion sobre el desarrollo del cosmos sino la vital para preservar la soberania y lograr la prosperidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles consideran como una espina en la garganta a la RPDC que avanza por el camino recto de la independencia, el del Songun y el del socialismo.
					
					El imperio toma como severo desafio a su estrategia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico el levantamiento de la Corea prospera en el centro estrategico del siglo XXI e intenta tomar el lanzamiento exitoso de la unidad no.2 del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3" como oportunidad propicia para derrumbar nuestro regimen.
					
					Esta vez el imperio hizo aprobar la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU negando y cuestionando obstinadamente el derecho de la RPDC al lanzamiento de satelites, lo cual es una provocacion intolerable y astuta que puso al desnudo la negacion y la hostilidad a la ideologia y regimen optados por el pueblo coreano. 
					
					El 12 de diciembre pasado, dia de lanzamiento del satelite, ya advertimos a EE.UU. y otros paises interesados que la concepcion hostil no daria ayuda a nadie y no se podria resolver ningun problema con el enfrentamiento y que deseamos que todos los paises interesados mantuvieran el juicio sano y la serenidad para que no se creara una situacion no deseada por  nadie. 
					
					A pesar de esto, EE.UU. tomo la actitud muy arrogante de deshonrar la dignidad de la nacion coreana.  Instigo a aprobar por fin la "resolucion de sancion" para agravar intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno hablando de las supuestas "medidas importantes". 
					
					Puesto que ha llegado al climax la estrategia hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. para atropellarla con las fuerzas y que se ha evidenciado el hecho de que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana no pasa de ser una discusion vana antes de ser desnuclearizado el mundo entero, no tenemos otro remedio mas que tomar las fuertes contramedidas fisicas para la defensa de la soberania. 
					
					Es justa nuestra causa para defender la independencia y la justicia y es cierto nuestro triunfo. 
					
					EE.UU. conocera que tragico seria el precio de su insulto al pueblo coreano. 
					
					En el enfrentamiento total, nueva etapa de la lucha antiyanqui, se lanzaran sucesivamente nuestros satelites artificiales y cohetes de largo alcance y se realizara la prueba nuclear de alto nivel tomando por blanco al imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano. 
					
					El mundo vera como mostraran su poderio el ejercito y pueblo, conscientes de la justeza de su causa y unidos en torno a su lider con la unica alma y proposito, y como creara la gran historia de la construccion de un Estado prospera.

articles.title: EE.UU. no podra doblegar al pueblo coreano, ratifica Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. no podra doblegar al pueblo coreano, ratifica Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC acusandola de lanzamiento de satelite, lo que deviene otra violacion brutal a la soberania nacional e insulto a la dignidad de la RPDC. 
					Asi insiste el periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual del dia 27 y prosigue: 
					
					Los paises miembros del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU dejaron otra mala reputacion mas vergonzosa en la historia por haber lisonjeado a ciegas a EE.UU., revela el comentario y continua: 
					
					EE.UU. embriagado por la confianza excesiva en si mismo y la arrogancia, perturba gravemente la paz y la estabilidad del mundo infringiendo a su antojo los derechos internacionales en todos los rincones del mundo. 
					
					Si tolera el despotismo, las arbitrariedades y la politica hostil de Estados Unidos anti-RPDC, esta no podra desarrollar la ciencia y tecnica ni fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional ni defender la soberania y la dignidad de su pais. Esto significa, en su esencia, privar del derecho a la subsistencia del pais y la nacion. 
					
					La RPDC no vivira nunca con vileza aunque otros paises actuen segun el baston de mando de EE.UU. sin replicar ni una palabra ante su arrogancia y presion.
					
					La RPDC tiene la poderosa fuerza fisica para garantizar con seguridad la soberania y dignidad de si misma.
					
					Y ejercera dignamente su soberania nacional sin hacer caso de las criticas de EE.UU. y sus satelites y hara todo lo posible necesario al desarrollo del pais.
					
					Es invariable la voluntad de los militares y civiles coreanos de enfrentarse con las fuerzas armadas a EE.UU. y concluir victoriosamente el enfrentamiento antiyanqui de varios decenios. 
					
					EE.UU. no debe dudarlo ni en lo minimo.

articles.title: Nadie podra detener el derecho al desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nadie podra detener el derecho al desarrollo de cosmos con fines pacificos, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este lunes un articulo individual apuntando que nadie podra detener el  derecho al desarrollo del cosmos y otros independientes del pueblo coreano. 
					Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas satelites cuestionan obstinadamente el lanzamiento del satelite de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el fin de arrodillar y atropellar a esta que no obedece a su despotismo y arbitrariedades, revela el articulo y prosigue: 
					
					Con motivo del lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC, EE.UU. habla ruidosamente de la "amenaza de misiles" de esta para justificar su movimiento militar por la supremacia. 
					
					El imperio presento la politica de dar importancia a la region de Asia-Pacifico y trata de fabricar la OTAN de cuno asiatico incorporando al Sur de Corea, Japon, Australia y otros paises, y a la larga, establecer el sistema regional de defensa antimisil. Y utiliza el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC en crear el ambiente favorable a ese fin. 
					
					Debido a tales maniobras, la situacion ha llegado a la fase imprevisible, lo que confirma que para defender la justicia y la soberania nacional es imprescindible fortalecer sus propias fuerzas. 
					
					Es muy obvio que la RPDC no pueda renunciar el derecho independiente al uso del cosmos reconocido por los derechos internacionales. 
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites no deben abusarlo para la realizacion de su malsano designio. 
					
					No deben actuar con irresponsabilidad buscando solo los intereses inmediatos sino reflexionarse con seriedad de sus consecuencias.
